message.entry: Expected foreground Mask to be a matrix of the same size as the foreground image.
Parameter ForegroundOpacity is used only for Alpha mode.
Parameter FilterSize is used only for Guided mode.
For the input location, the Foreground image is not visible on the output image.
Foreground Mask is required for {0} Blend mode.
Input Mask does not include information from the foreground image.
{0} mode requires the number of rows and columns of the input images to be greater than or equal to three.
